for a place where you can find unified information about your career at EPAM? Check LEVEL UP - your personal guide to navigate professional growth - from choosing the right career target to defining and developing required skills.\\r\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Go to the LEVEL UP portal (wich will be available after your start date), explore recommended career options, build a path to the desired target, choose it, and start working on the skills you need to achieve your goal.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":5949,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/25e29638-fc4b-493b-a7db-aab2cc10536e/feedback.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/25e29638-fc4b-493b-a7db-aab2cc10536e/feedback.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"feedback.PNG\",\"name\":\"feedback.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"25e29638-fc4b-493b-a7db-aab2cc10536e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":546,\"height\":71},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Feedback \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"is an important part of the Performance Review program at EPAM. It is a regular and ongoing process for obtaining feedback on the quality of your work from your colleagues and customers. Reviews are collected and processed by Resource Managers, after which employees are provided with consolidated feedback.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Feedback results are taken into account when developing your career development plan.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"//videoportal.epam.com/video/iframe.html?video=noPnEZJX\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":6771,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/686d161b-d44b-4aad-93d7-5ff1bd56d3c5/asmt.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/686d161b-d44b-4aad-93d7-5ff1bd56d3c5/asmt.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"asmt.PNG\",\"name\":\"asmt.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"686d161b-d44b-4aad-93d7-5ff1bd56d3c5\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":562,\"height\":71},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Promotion is an important event in the life of every employee.
